## Container.getPropertyData() method

Get property metadata by decorator name key with caching.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getPropertyData(decoratorNameKey: string | symbol, target: Function | object, propertyName: string | symbol): any;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

The decorator name key


</td></tr>

</td><td>

Function \| object


</td><td>

The target class or object


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

propertyName


</td><td>

string \| symbol


</td><td>

The property name


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

any

The metadata value for the property

## Example


```ts
const value = container.getPropertyData('key', UserService, 'property');
```
